title: Change email address
body:
Hi, I want to change my email address because of my old email had been hacked in Jan. this year, but the system showed my I still need the old email to see the code, is there any way I can change my new email address without old email? Because I cannot use my old email now. 
Thank you

replies.body:
Wouldn't be able to from the website itself, but if you go ahead and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (Account Recovery category) our support team will be able to help you out :)

Lemme know if you run into any problems
